channel.title: Need Help Please, I Want To Make A Runescape Client?
channel.description:
Well does anyone wanna help me? I Need to Know What I Need. And Tutorials On How To, Contact Me As Soon As Possible Please?
Help Please :D
~~~Jake Mc :P

item.title: Need Help Please, I Want To Make A Runescape Client?
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Oh My Gawd! Another Error?!? Heres another screenie :confused: [i]NoClassDefFoundError[/i]

Either:

  1. Instead of just ‘java program’, do java cp . program
  2. To the CLASSPATH Environment Variable, add . to the end. It might look like this now:
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk_1.5.x\bin;.

Notice the . at the end? (the ; sign seperates the different paths)

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Please, I Want To Make A Runescape Client?
item.dc:creator: @Scar Scar
item.description:
@Scar wrote:

[quote=“Jake Mc, post:23, topic:32549”]i didn’t post that so don’t blame me -.-
P.s. Do you think you could help me with my problem above?[/quote]

umm il start from the beginning :
first open up notepad and type this in it :

public class Hello { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello"); } }
save that as Hello.java

then put the file here : C:\Java
after you’ve done that open up cmd and type in :

cd C:\java

then

javac Hello.java

then after it compiled

java Hello

that should do it

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Please, I Want To Make A Runescape Client?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

In your Path variable (Remember how we took the bin for the jdk?), add the path to your jre bin.

It’ll be something like: C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5OMGVERSIONNUMBERS\bin
And that goes into your Path variable.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Please, I Want To Make A Runescape Client?
item.dc:creator: @Scar Scar
item.description:
@Scar wrote:

[quote=“Jake Mc, post:12, topic:32549”]Thanks for that, but i know what that does without even running it, just types i r newb…
If thats wrong, wanna tell me what it really does?[/quote]
but you also need to know what this means public static void main(String[] args) or class Exampleand the other things

its not about knowing what it does but knowing how it does…

don’t be lazy and try to type it yourself so you’ll get used to it.
after that start with adding an IF command or ELSE…that’s how i learnt the basics

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Please, I Want To Make A Runescape Client?
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

Jake Mc:

No, I just really don’t get the language, Fury once gave me tuts and stuff but i didn’t get it… Anyone wanna try and help me learn the basics of java?

Doubt it.

Go look at some examples and edit them see how it works.

Here ill give you one :

public class newb {
public static void main(String[] args) {
System.out.println("i r newb");
}
}

Save it as newb.java.

Read full topic
